txt.en: 'You, down there! Halt! What do you think you're doing here!?'
Ferndur has nearly finished summoning the massive death cloud
'The kings of Rhudaur cannot aid you fools...they are our slaves!'
Clouds of disease now spread across the inner chamber
Ferndur has begun to summon a large death cloud. Only a few minutes remain
'Let the shadows consume you all!'
'Hold nothing back... destroy them!'
'Struggle, little mortals. Weaken and die, so that we may take your husks for ourselves.'
'Long ago, we were forced to watch as Ferndúr committed his perverse rites in the lower temple.'
You have obliterated Ferndúr's plague
'Now he does so again, preparing to unleash a scourge that will devastate the North.'
An ancient fell spirit has been defeated
'Those who would enter that temple must open the three kings' chambers as one.'
An ancient fell spirit has been defeated
'But be warned: Ferndúr has laid traps for those who would interfere. Your death awaits.'
'Three kings of Rhudaur, brothers in arms, rivals in spirit. Here we lie entombed.'
'We accepted the mantle of Angmar, and so here we shall remain until it is lifted at last.'
'In our penance, we watch this place, but are powerless to condemn the evils within.'
Destroy all of the infected corpses in Ferndúr's chamber before defeating the Gaunt-lord himself.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest will be cancelled if you leave the Lost Temple before completing it.</rgb>
'Rhudaur fell to darkness without battle, for our will was bent before our swords were raised.'
'Now Ferndúr means to break the will of the North, overcoming all with decay and despair.'
'And for our role, we who were once kings are now condemned to watch as his evil gathers... unless you can stop him.'
'All the North shall fall to the plague... beginning with you! Arise, my soldiers, arise and destroy!'
'Call upon me and my brothers as one, and we shall open the way.'
'You seek to wake the ancient kings? It shall not be mortals... you shall succumb here instead.'
'Ah, my friends, I am afraid you are too late.'
'You shall be among the first to join my army as my plague sweeps the North.'
'But first, you shall perish!'
'Listen to me! Most of our men are so sick they can barely move!'
'Enough playing!'
'And now your high and mighty Lord Ferndúr has taken the rest and disappeared into those crypts.'
'You dare to oppose me? Let me teach you the error of your ways.'
'We haven't heard anything from them in over a day now!'
'This cannot be! You cannot still live! How do you still live!?'
'You tell me what's going on here, or I'll have the rest of my men out of here before nightfall!'
Find a way to enter Ferndúr's chamber
'Another dies, soon to rise at my bidding.'
Destroy all the corpses before defeating Ferndúr
'Look, dear Sidhág, it seems we have uninvited guests.'
'Prepare to be enveloped in disease and decay!'
While Gorothúl lives, do not defeat the ancient fell spirits
'You are too weak! Your inevitable decay was only a matter of time.'
'Lord Ferndúr will be displeased that we have been found out.'
'You'd best be telling the truth, Angmarim, or Ferndúr will have one less 'loyal servant' at his side after we leave.'
'Then let us ensure that he is not disturbed with such... trivialities.'
'But, sir, half of us have taken ill since we arrived.'
'Have a heart, won't you? We need a rest!'
'Ferndúr showed us how to find this place.'
'The loot's ours for the taking, and you want to quit now because you've got a cold?'
'Brother! Help me!'
'Get back to digging, you fools!'
'To me, shadows!'
Ferndúr the Virulent remains scheming deep within the Rhudauran temple.

Ferndúr the Virulent has nearly completed his deadly experiments beneath the lost Rhudauran temple.\n\nThe plagues he has concocted are too deadly to be allowed to fester. You must <rgb=#FF0000>destroy all the corpses within his chamber before the Gaunt-lord himself is defeated</rgb> in order to ensure that every trace of them is obliterated.
*cough* 'Curse this illness...'
'Looks like we've got company, boys! Up and at 'em!'
'Now it seems everyone's got it.'
'Have no fear, my dear captain.'
'No! My dear brother! You shall pay for this!'
'Lord Ferndúr's preparations are nearly complete.'
'NO! My sister! You shall die for this!'
'You and the rest of your... companions... should be ready to embark come morning.'
'So it seems, brother. How... distasteful.'
'I suppose he would... if he ever knew they were here.'
'Serving that... thing... Ferndúr -- that's bad enough.'
'But now every man of us has fallen ill since we came to this accursed place.'
'No slacking, you lot!'
'This whole deal stinks. We want out!'
'Ferndúr said anything we find here is ours for the taking!'
'There's no time for your snivelling!'
'When he's found whatever it is he came looking for, we're leaving!'
'I have no patience for your disruptions. Your lungs will fill with foul toxin!'
'See to your wounds! I will deal with these fools!'
Challenge: The Lost Temple -- Clean Sweep
'Please... don't kill us! We'll serve him!'
